title: Centre of Digital and Human Transformation
desc: CDHX is founded by Indonesian and global leaders of digital and hr tranformation who voluntarily serve as our board of advisor. Our programs are designed to deliver effective development of individual and corporate capabilities that would contribute to the vision of 2045 Indonesia Emas.
